channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- ProfileGrid
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- ProfileGrid

item.title: CVE-2023-0940|2024-08-02T05:32:45.037Z -- unknown -- profilegrid
item.description: The ProfileGrid WordPress plugin before 5.3.1 provides an AJAX endpoint for resetting a user password but does not implement proper authorization. This allows a user with low privileges, such as subscriber, to change the password of any account, including Administrator ones.
